Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute at Fullerton/Monticello
ShortDescription: 74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park & Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park, then resume their normal route at Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/79th
ShortDescription: SB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, I-94, 83rd & Lafayette, due to fire department activity near Lafayette/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, I-94, 83rd and Lafayette, due to fire department activity near Lafayette/79th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Lake
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
